string-array.name: settings_hints
string-array.item: The minimum speed of the car in which the measurements are considered valid
The maximum speed of the car in which the measurements are considered valid
Discrete value of the interval length
The threshold value of the standard deviation of excellent quality road
The threshold value of the standard deviation of good quality road
The threshold value of the standard deviation of satisfactory quality road
Minimum time discrete value for calculation to determine the bump event
The data value for the minimum value filter. As a percentage of the gravity vector
Acceleration value at which bump event is determined. As a percentage of the gravity vector
Minimum time discrete value for calculation to detrmine rotation
The minimum change in the angle of the vector of gravity below which it is believed that data is valid

string-array.name: help_pager_item
string-array.item: Find a road condition issue \n on your way you want to report
Tap on (+) button in the right bottom corner \n of the app screen
Use your mobile phone camera to take \n some photos of the issue
Provide issue details: select type of the issue \n and add notes to correctly report it
View and track your reported issue \n on a street map
Setup your smartphone on a car cradle VERTICALLY (preferred) or put it on the flat dashboard for evaluation
Get results in real-time while driving by using automatic roughness evaluation
Review current evaluation results or all time results
